txt.en: 'I am glad to see your safe return, [placeholder], and will make use of these components in the fashioning of your equipment.\n\n'I hope that you have as much fortune obtaining the next set of components I need. The second set of materials I need are the eyes of worms, such as are found in Angmar, and the remains of wights found in Imlad Balchorth in Angmar.'
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder]?'
Articles of Harmony

'My heart is joyful to see you return from the darkness, [placeholder]! One set of components remains, and I fear this will be your greatest challenge. But despair not! You will wear the equipment I make for you with greater satisfaction in memory of the triumph it will represent!\n\n'I need you to bring me a horn from the Gorthorog Tarlûg, who resides in Carn Dûm. I also need a badge of rank from the goblins of Urugarth.'
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder]?'
Collected matted snowbeast-furs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Snowbeasts are common on the slopes of the Misty Mountains. The goblins you seek serve the Tarkrîp Orcs of Mallenhad in Angmar.'

'You have returned from out of the darkness, [placeholder], and my heart leaps to see you victorious! I will make use of these last components in the fashioning of your equipment.\n\n'I give this to you with the deepest respect for your worthiness as a minstrel, [placeholder]. Use it well, and bring hope to the Free Peoples! These dark days will pass, and word of your deeds will be a pleasant memory by the hearth when peace comes again. It is with great joy that I call you friend.'
Collected brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp plates ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Look for the worms in Gorothlad in Angmar and the wights in Imlad Balchorth.'
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder]? Why is this?'
Collected clouded worm-eyes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Snowbeasts can be found in the Misty Mountains. Goblins are encamped with the Tarkrîp Orcs in Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nBaillindiel asked you to bring her matted snowbeast-fur and brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp-plates.
'Seek the Gorthorog Tarlûg at Carn Dûm. Goblins guard the tower of Urugarth, also in Angmar.'
Collected revered wight-remains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect goblin-badge of rank
Baillindiel is at the Elf-harbour of Celondim, in Ered Luin.\n\nBaillindiel is waiting for you to return with the first set of components.
Collected ashen Gorthorog-horn
Bring last set of components to Baillindiel
Worms can be found in Angmar. Wights can be found in Imlad Balchorth in Angmar.\n\nBaillindiel asked you to bring her clouded worm-eyes and revered wight-remains.
Collected goblin-badge of rank
Collect ashen Gorthorog-horn
Baillindiel is at the Elf-harbour of Celondim, in Ered Luin.\n\nBaillindiel is waiting for you to return with the second set of components.
Collect goblin-badge of rank
Tarlûg can be found at Carn Dûm in Angmar. Goblins can be found at Urugarth in Angmar.\n\nBaillindiel asked you to bring her an ashen Gorthorog-horn and a goblin-badge of rank.
Baillindiel is at the Elf-harbour of Celondim, in Ered Luin.\n\nBaillindiel is waiting for you to return with the last set of components.
Collect matted snowbeast-furs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp plates ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring first set of components to Baillindiel
Collect clouded worm-eyes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect revered wight-remains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring second set of components to Baillindiel
Collect clouded worm-eyes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect revered wight-remains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect ashen Gorthorog-horn
Baillindiel has agreed to help you fashion a piece of equipment that will be of use to a renowned minstrel such as you.

'For a minstrel of such heart as you, [placeholder], I will gladly fashion some truly remarkable equipment. The components I will need for its making will not be easily obtained, but I know that you will succeed.

'I will need you to bring me the items I will need. The first items I will need are furs from the snowbeasts of the Misty Mountains and brimstone-tinged armour-plates from the Tarkrîp goblins in Angmar.

'I will see you again, [placeholder], and we will sing of your deeds when you return in triumph!'
